mutants.code:
def find_digit_in_sequence(k: int) -> int:
    """"""
    strs = []
    s_ps = [0]
    t_ps = [0]
    s_len = 0
    t_len = 0
    x = 0
    while t_len < k:
        x += 1
        xs = str(x)
        strs.append(xs)
        s_len += len(xs)
        s_ps.append(s_len)
        t_len += s_len
        t_ps.append(t_len)
    nn = k - t_ps[-2]
    si = bisect_left(s_ps, nn) - 1
    ss = strs[si] if si < len(strs) else None
    sci = nn - s_ps[si] - 1
    sc = ss[sci]
    return int(sc)

def find_digit_in_sequence(k: int) -> int:
    """
    Finds the digit at the specified position k in the infinite sequence "112123123412345...".

    Parameters:
    k (int): The position in the sequence (1-based index).

    Returns:
    int: The digit at the specified position k.
    """
    strs = []
    s_ps = [0]
    t_ps = [0]
    s_len = 1
    t_len = 0
    x = 0
    while t_len < k:
        x += 1
        xs = str(x)
        strs.append(xs)
        s_len += len(xs)
        s_ps.append(s_len)
        t_len += s_len
        t_ps.append(t_len)
    nn = k - t_ps[-2]
    si = bisect_left(s_ps, nn) - 1
    ss = strs[si] if si < len(strs) else None
    sci = nn - s_ps[si] - 1
    sc = ss[sci]
    return int(sc)

    Finds the digit at the specified position k in the infinite sequence "112123123412345...".

    Parameters:
    k (int): The position in the sequence (1-based index).

    Returns:
    int: The digit at the specified position k.
    """
    strs = []
    s_ps = [0]
    t_ps = [1]
    s_len = 0
    t_len = 0
    x = 0
    while t_len < k:
        x += 1
        xs = str(x)
        strs.append(xs)
        s_len += len(xs)
        s_ps.append(s_len)
        t_len += s_len
        t_ps.append(t_len)
    nn = k - t_ps[-2]
    si = bisect_left(s_ps, nn) - 1
    ss = strs[si] if si < len(strs) else None
    sci = nn - s_ps[si] - 1
    sc = ss[sci]
    return int(sc)
